article: taiwanese authorities on thursday arrested three suspects in this week 's airport clashes over the opposition leader 's trip to rival china , and investigated the possible role of three lawmakers and a talk show host in inciting the violence .
abstract: taiwan investigates three lawmakers and talk show host over airport violence
